Text:
MANTESH, you have my dreams come true countless times and was wondering if you could help me with the following:

Strategic Planning: What every manager must know__George Albert Steiner.
How to Win Friends and Influence People__Dale Carnage
Strategic Supply Chain Management __Shoshanah Cohen & Joseph Roussel 

Thanks!
Mantesh, you always come up with the goods. Great work, thanks so much.
